formElement.label: Working Directory
formElement.documentation: Provide the path where the project resides.

formElement.label: Make File
formElement.documentation: Provide the makefile to execute in case its name is not 'Makefile'.(This is the command-line '-f' option)

formElement.label: Target
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the target or targets in the Makefile to execute.

formElement.label: - P
formElement.documentation: Displays information to standard output, and then runs the build. If no makefile or command-line target exists, it displays information only.(This is the command-line '-P' option)

formElement.label: - A
formElement.documentation: Forces a build of all evaluated targets, even if not out-of-date with respect to dependencies. This does not force a build of unrelated targets.(This is the command-line '-A' option)

formElement.label: - K
formElement.documentation: Continues building unrelated dependencies if a command returns an error.(This is the command-line '-K' option)

formElement.label: - C
formElement.documentation: Suppresses default output, including nonfatal NMAKE errors or warnings, timestamps, and NMAKE copyright messages.(This is the command-line '-C' option)

formElement.label: Additional Options
formElement.documentation: Provide additional NMake options to execute, if desired.
